org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering

Class FuzzyCMeansLocalClusterer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering.BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer<DenseLocalOnHeapMatrix>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering.FuzzyCMeansLocalClusterer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clusterer<DenseLocalOnHeapMatrix,FuzzyCMeansModel>, WeightedClusterer<DenseLocalOnHeapMatrix,FuzzyCMeansModel>

    public class FuzzyCMeansLocalClusterer
extends BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer<DenseLocalOnHeapMatrix>
implements WeightedClusterer<DenseLocalOnHeapMatrix,FuzzyCMeansModel>
    Implements the local version of Fuzzy C-Means algorithm for weighted points.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering.BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer

    • Constructor Detail

      • FuzzyCMeansLocalClusterer

        public FuzzyCMeansLocalClusterer(DistanceMeasure measure,
                                 double exponentialWeight,
                                 BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer.StopCondition stopCond,
                                 double maxDelta,
                                 int maxIterations,
                                 Long seed)
        Constructor that retains all required parameters.
        Parameters:
        measure - Distance measure.
        exponentialWeight - Specific constant which is used in calculating of membership matrix.
        stopCond - Flag that tells when algorithm should stop.
        maxDelta - The maximum distance between old and new centers or maximum difference between new and old membership matrix elements for which algorithm must stop.
        maxIterations - The maximum number of FCM iterations.
